short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tako Chrome Extension Wallet By Mixin

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tako(On the basis of Mixin Network) Chrome Extension Wallet
A simple and powerful Chrome Extension wallet for accessing digital assets on Mixin Network

* 49,500+ cryptocurrencies
* Lightning fast transactions
* Multiple accounts supports
* Securely stored
